hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
umask 0022
./configure --enable-debug --enable-64bit scan-build-5.0 -enable-checker optin.performance.Padding -analyzer-config stable-report-filename=true -v make
echo "Retrieve the last scan-build (-o of scan-build is failing)" SCAN_BUILD_DIR=$(ls -1d /tmp/scan-build-*|tail -1) mkdir -p reports/
if ! grep h1 $SCAN_BUILD_DIR/index.html|grep nspr >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "Not a scan-build report for nspr" exit 0 fi
rm -rf reports/nspr-scan-build
echo "Move it" mv $SCAN_BUILD_DIR reports/nspr-scan-build
echo "Set correct permissions" chmod o+rx reports/ chmod o+r reports/nspr-scan-build/*
echo "Send it" rsync -arv -R reports/nspr-scan-build/ sledru@people.mozilla.org:/home/sledru/public_html/ # --delete removed because of .htaccess & .htpasswd rm -rf reports/nspr-scan-build/
